relation: When you take a document offline, it can change the version of the Word document.
When creating a project from a baseline, an error occurs: "Unable to translate view query: Unknown external project".
When creating a project from a template, an error occurs: "An internal error has occurred. Error Number: -2147418113..."
In RequisiteWeb, an error occurs when accessing package security as an LDAP user: "Error 500: Cannot find requested collection member."
In RequisiteWeb, you are unable to clear suspect children from Traceability Matrix view.
In RequisiteWeb, a guest user cannot open a document.
In RequisiteWeb, a circular trace error occurs when creating a traceability relationship.
In RequisiteWeb, the color markup for requirement types is not working in documents.
Importing a baseline created from Microsoft SQL Server into Microsoft Access fails.
In RequisiteWeb, when using online editing with a reverse proxy configuration, the wrong URL is displayed in the connection message.
When creating a project from baseline on Oracle, an error occurs if the project contains long discussions.
The Package.Count method in the RequisitePro Extensibility Interface (RPX) returns incorrect results.
When exporting a view to CSV, Japanese characters are unreadable.
When comparing two baselines, an error occurs: java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException.
Users with read and update permissions for a package cannot modify attribute values.
In RequisiteWeb, an error occurs when opening a document that contains requirements that span multiple cells of a table.
When creating a database for Rational RequisitePro in Microsoft SQL Server 2000 or 2003, a warning occurs When running the 'tables and indexes.sql' script.
In RequisiteWeb after moving requirements between packages, invalid error messages and links are displayed.
An error occurs when creating a project from a baseline.
In RequisiteWeb, the project login does not complete.
Synchronizing the integration with Rational Requirements Composer is very slow as unnecessary processing occurs.
In RequisiteWeb, when multiple users open a project concurrently, errors can occur: "Cannot open Key database /RequisitePro.KDB. Error Code: 19".
In RequisiteWeb, the Attribute Matrix View has slow performance.
pageTitle: IBM Fix list for Rational RequisitePro - United States

textAfterTable: Download 7.1.4.4 24 June 2014 Superseded Component APAR Headline -- -- This fix pack adresses several security issues. Review Security Bulletins CVE-2014-0076, CVE-2014-0964, CVE-2014-0963, CVE-2014-0160, CVE-2014-0114 Back to top Interim Fix 1 (7.1.4.3_iFix001) Link Date Released Status Download 7.1.4.3_iFix001 22 April 2014 Superseded Component APAR Headline -- -- This interim fix addresses a vulnerability in OpenSSL. Review the Security bulletins CVE-2014-0076 and CVE-2014-0160 for more information. Back to top
